description: Time slice at year 2100 of GeoMIP G6solar.
long_name: SSTs from year 2100 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G6solar
rationale: To assess radiative forcing of G6solar after 80 years of simulation.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 2100 for 10 years, to coincide with the final year of the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 experiment
requirements.label: 2100-2101 10yrs100

requirements.description: Reduce solar irradiance to reduce the radiative forcing of ScenarioMIP high forcing scenario (SSP5-85) to match that of the ScenarioMIP medium forcing scenario (SSP2-45).
requirements.keywords: GeoMIP, solar mitigation, SSP5-85 to SSP2-45, solar irradiance reduction
requirements.label: SolarRCP85toRCP45

requirements.description: 2100 sea surface temperature from the G6solar GeoMIP experiment.
requirements.label: G6solarSST2100

requirements.description: 2100 sea ice concentration from the G6solar GeoMIP experiment.
requirements.label: G6solarSIC2100

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is made from the final year of the GeoMIP G6solar experiment
requirements.label: G6solarInitialisation

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
